name: @junctionrelay/plugin-host-windows
description: Host system metrics collector plugin for JunctionRelay (Windows)

junctionrelay.description: CPU, GPU, memory, disk, network, and battery monitoring using psutil

setupInstructions.title: Requirements
setupInstructions.body: This plugin requires bundled Python 3.11 with psutil and GPUtil pre-installed. These are included when deploying via the build scripts.

setupInstructions.title: GPU Support
setupInstructions.body: NVIDIA GPUs are detected via GPUtil. AMD/Intel GPUs on Windows use gpu-reader.exe (included in binaries/). On Linux, AMD GPUs are read via sysfs.

junctionrelay.setupNote: No configuration needed. The plugin automatically detects available hardware sensors.
